name: XWUI Center Component
description: Center component for centering content horizontally and/or vertically. Supports horizontal centering, vertical centering, and inline mode. Useful for centering content within containers.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

inline.description: Whether to use inline display mode

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the center container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to center

children.description: Children element or HTML string (alias for content)
